 ll power(ll a, ll b, ll m) {
    ll r = 1;
    while(b) {
        if(b & 1) r = r * a % m;
        a = (a * a)% m;
        b >>= 1;
    }
    return r;
}
 ll power(ll a, ll b) {
     ll r = 1;
    while(b) {
        if(b & 1) r = r * a ;
        a = a * a;
        b >>= 1;
    }
    return r;
}

      return b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b);

               b[i]=a[i+j-1];
           }

                   b[i]=a[k];

               {

               }

    }
